players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice was killed. We have 3 left. I suspect Charlie might be mafia."

Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice. I was with Bob the whole night. Bob, you were safe."
You: "Charlie, you killed Alice. I trust Diana's investigation and vote to eliminate you."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be mafia. Bob, vote him. I will vote for Charlie."
Charlie: " at the beginning. So final answer: 'MESSAGE: "
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
